main.name: Roberto Langa
main.description: Curiosity powered life form, with love of learning and high attention to details. Slightly OCD-ish (to be pronounced 'organized')
main.bio: Learning how to speak JavaScript & React at the moment. Really into Front-end as it soothes my OCD senses and need for having things perfectly aligned while also addressing my need to be challenged and find the best possible solution. I'm also a photographer & filmmaker. Visual Storytelling is my craft.
main.contactmessage: Mail delivered by ravens or owls is the most endorsed method of establishing contact. The letter that I was suposed to receive by owl when I was 11 years old never arrived so I'm looking forward to experiencing this.

education.description: Javascript | ReactJS | HTML5 | CSS3 | SCSS | Bootstrap | NodeJS | mySQL | Git | Github | Unix | Agile | SCRUM

education.school: University of Bucharest, Faculty of Geography
education.description: Bachelor Degree in Tourism and Geography. Coursework included multiculturalism, political geography, cultural tourism, regional geography, oceanography, cartography.

work.title: Community & Location Manager
work.description: Highly entrepreneurial working environment. During my collaboration with Impact Hub Bucharest I had 3 roles: Community Catalyst - Business Developer - Community Manager. My journey began with building a community at the first location, and when the second location opened I took the role of finding clients & establishing partnerships to later accept the role of the Community & Location Manager for Impact Hub Universitate managing a team of 5.

work.title: Jack of all Trades/Co-Founder
work.description: Entrepreneurial life: In the first half of 2019  my father and I opened a restaurant in Bad Kreuznach, Germany.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: That Roberto Langa must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of bootcamp and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
